MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 05-APR-2021 22:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the CH7 postcode area of Mold, affecting properties in Heol Y Goron, Llys Ann, Ffordd Estyn and surrounding area. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of repairs required to an underground cable fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:11PM on 5th April 2021.
